meanings.sent1: The detective retaken the stolen jewelry from the thief.
meanings.sent2: She retaken her lost keys after searching the entire house.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat retaken the toy mouse from the curious dog.
meanings.sent4: The team retaken the lead in the final minutes of the game.
meanings.sent5: The student retaken the top spot in the class with hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: To recover possession of by force
meanings.sent1: The army retaken control of the city after a long battle.
meanings.sent2: He retaken his stolen bike from the thief with a strong grip.
meanings.sent3: The superhero retaken the precious artifact from the villain's lair.
meanings.sent4: The king retaken his throne from the usurper with a swift strike.
meanings.sent5: The explorer retaken the ancient treasure from the depths of the jungle.

meanings.sent1: The artist retaken the beauty of nature in his paintings.
meanings.sent2: They retaken their friendship after a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent3: The gardener retaken the overgrown garden and turned it into a paradise.
meanings.sent4: The musician retaken the hearts of the audience with a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The writer retaken the essence of storytelling in her latest novel.
